archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0655
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable system initiated as well as agent initiated ad-hoc customer communications configured with customer account data Including: 1. Voice call 2. Text 3. Email

properties.value: Can you please explain what do you mean by Voice call? IVR or agent? Daily calls to the customer based on file integration. Voice call is first step. When voice call will failed Comarch will receive appropriate information (file integration) and customer

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
